DocAttribute.Name: TextCharacterAppearance
DocAttribute.Documentation: A character style to be used for presented text.

DocAttribute.Name: TextStyle
DocAttribute.Documentation: The style applied to the text block for its visual appearance. It defines the text block characteristics, either for vector based or monospace text fonts (see select item _IfcTextStyleWithBoxCharacteristics_), or for true type text fonts (see select item _IfcTextStyleTextModel_. > IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  The attribute TextBlockStyle has been changed from SET[1:?] to a non-aggregated optional, it has been renamed from TextStyles.

DocAttribute.Name: TextFontStyle
DocAttribute.Documentation: The style applied to the text font for its visual appearance. It defines the font family, font style, weight and size. > IFC2x Edition 2 Addendum 2 CHANGE The attribute TextFontStyle is a new attribute attached to IfcTextStyle.
